data.text: @socflyny @1308_21904 @K_G_Andersen @PeterHotez @scrippsresearch Yeah, that article says I’ll have “very good” immunity from my January BA.1 for 90 days.. that expires pretty soon. Just started feeling less fatigued and I don’t want to go back to that. Also don’t want another week of no childcare even if we’re all “fine”
@MoreauGabarain @K_G_Andersen @PeterHotez @scrippsresearch Boston increased substantially over last week in southern system : https://t.co/3w0yV8lCPg @MassDPH @MWRA_update @BiobotAnalytics

@1308_21904 @socflyny @K_G_Andersen @PeterHotez @scrippsresearch You are very confused. The graphs on this site have some projections.
The actual data is that covid is continuing to accelerate in Denmark and they anticipate its continued acceleration until June based on their model.  Also their death RATE is growing as is excess mortality.

@1308_21904 @socflyny @K_G_Andersen @PeterHotez @scrippsresearch How do you "move on" from something that people are still dying from every day?  That people with long covid are suffering from every day for years?  That prior are still being sick from?  "Everyone you know" is a pretty self-centered viewpoint. I know many with major problems.

@1308_21904 @M_Ben_Yehuda @K_G_Andersen @PeterHotez @scrippsresearch Thanks -- it's just important that people don't get a false sense of security and dismiss breakthroughs as "mild" or not a big deal. No one knows how they will react to the virus.

@socflyny @M_Ben_Yehuda @K_G_Andersen @PeterHotez @scrippsresearch Sorry to hear about your prolonged symptoms. I too am triple vaxxed and live in an area with low a infection rate. Everyone I know that has had omicron has not had any major issues. Hoping we can move on from this.

@M_Ben_Yehuda @socflyny @K_G_Andersen @PeterHotez @scrippsresearch Also, Americans are unfortunately paying a heavy price for an unhealthy lifestyle. 10’s of millions of Americans eat fast food, smoke, drink buckets of soda, just simply don’t take care of themselves. This has contributed heavily to increased Covid deaths in America.

@M_Ben_Yehuda @socflyny @K_G_Andersen @PeterHotez @scrippsresearch I feel sorry for those who have suffered with Covid! But, your comments about Denmark just are not accurate. They are living with Covid and recovering! 
https://t.co/Rc43mFNtoF

@M_Ben_Yehuda @1308_21904 @K_G_Andersen @PeterHotez @scrippsresearch Even without an underlying health issue, I had symptomatic breakthrough Omicron and it was hell. I still have bouts of fatigue and persistent headaches 8 weeks later.

I was hypervigilant and triple-vaxxed which only speaks to how insidious this virus is.
